body.p: To celebrate the Software Freedom Day, and as part of the Great Rotterdamâ€™s Atelier Weekend (GRAW). An FSFE Italian volunteer, Tommi is organizing a "Knitting Our Internet" workshop, an interactive journey through the history of the Internet.
The workshop will be hosted by Foundation B.a.d. Participation is open and free!
